messages.content:
Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
F(posp,posn) <+ d*Pos(posp,posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    initial Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
    analog

 Correction Criteria：Changed 'analog' to 'initial', converting the continuous behavior block to a one-time initialization block. This prevents the damper force from being continuously updated, causing incorrect static friction instead of dynamic velocity-dependent damping.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
F(posp,posn) <+ d * Pos(posp,posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
F(posp,posn) <+ d*Pos(posp,posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
inout a, b; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module damper (posp); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real d = -1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
parameter real d = 1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m

 Correction Criteria：Negative friction coefficient causes the damper to add energy to the system instead of dissipating it, violating fundamental physical behavior of dampers.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real d = -1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
parameter real d = 1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m

 Correction Criteria：Negative friction coefficient causes non-physical force amplification instead of damping, violating fundamental damper behavior by adding energy to the system.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
F(posp,posn) <+ d * Pos(posp,posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    analogue Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
    analog

 Correction Criteria：Changed 'analog' keyword to misspelled 'analogue'. This syntax error prevents recognition of the analog behavior block, causing the force equation to be ignored during simulation. The damper will provide zero resistance force.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
electrical posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
electrical  posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
electrical posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input posp, posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    analog initial Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
    analog

 Correction Criteria：Added 'initial' keyword creating a hybrid block that executes only once at time zero. This prevents continuous force calculation, breaking the damper's dynamic friction behavior as it fails to respond to position changes after initialization.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module damper (posp); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
inout posp posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
kinematic  posp, posn Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	F(posp,posn) <+ d*ddt(Pos(posp,posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module damper (posp posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real d = 1000  // friction coefficient given in N/m Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
parameter real d = 1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m

 Correction Criteria：Missing semicolon at the end of the parameter declaration statement, causing a syntax error as statements must be properly terminated.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    analogg Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
    analog

 Correction Criteria：Added an extra 'g' to 'analog' keyword, making it an unrecognized token in VerilogA syntax

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	F(posp,posn) <+ d*ddt(Pos(posp,posn)) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
inout posp posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    analogg Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
    analog

 Correction Criteria：Extra character 'g' added to keyword 'analog', making it unrecognized Verilog-A syntax

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
kinematic  posp posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    F(posp,posn) <+ d*ddt(Pos(posp,posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
inout posp posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module damper (posp, posn) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
inout posp, posn Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real d 1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
parameter real d = 1000;  // friction coefficient given in N/m

 Correction Criteria：Missing '=' assignment operator between parameter declaration and value

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
kinematic  posp, posn Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
inout posp posn; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    analog; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
    analog

 Correction Criteria：Added semicolon after 'analog' keyword, which terminates the block prematurely. VerilogA requires analog blocks to directly follow the keyword without termination before statements.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	F(posp,posn) <+ d*ddt(Pos(posp,posn))); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module damper (posp posn); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.
